title: SOLD Bender no trees Polar Bear SGC40

posts.post_title: SOLD Bender no trees Polar Bear SGC40
posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD 

Absolutely gorgeous SGC40 Bender no trees with super clean back.  The reason this card got graded a 3 is it looks like someone tried to rub off a tobacco stain on his leg and has a scuff that doesn't affect the appearance at all but cost a grade or more lower.  Great example of buy the card and not the grade. NO CREASES NO WRINKLES High End low grade.

SOLD $145/ BEST OFFER dlvd SOLD
